cast.name: 阿莱克斯·卡普·霍尔内 Alex Kapp Horner

writer.name: 布鲁斯·肯尼迪 Bruce Kennedy

director.name: 安妮·桑德博格 Anne Sundberg

this_title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park Season 1
trans_title: 富家子弟谋杀案：中央公园里的死亡 第一季
introduction: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park will expose evidence that was inadmissible in the trial and also examine the circumstances that made the story unfold the way it did: America's untamed ambition in the mid-1980s, the rarified lifestyle of New York's privileged prep school kids, sexism, elitism, an all-out tabloid media war that blamed the victim and an imperfect justice ...
chinese_title: 富家子弟谋杀案：中央公园里的死亡 第一季
foreign_title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park Season 1
